name: v1_cocktail
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cocktail_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Search thousands of cocktail recipes. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/cocktail.
API description: Fetches cocktail information from the API Ninjas Cocktail API based on the provided cocktail name or ingredients.

name.description: name of cocktail. This parameter supports partial matches (e.g. bloody will match bloody mary and bloody margarita)

ingredients.description: comma-separated string of ingredients to search. Only cocktails containing all listed ingredients will be returned. For example, to search cocktails containing Vodka and lemon juice, use vodka,lemon juice.
